name: Trick or Treat (itch) (AST)
description:
Based on Halloween Trick or Treat calture.

Get  your neighbor's candies in the small red roof town.

Although the playtime is short, it will be your companion for your boring matchmaking time.

Some elements of the game have been put on hold for release within Halloween.

Stay tuned for an update after Halloween.

note : It is my first released game.

If you see something immature please kindly understand

I will be a big help for developers by leaving your feedback in the comments.

love ❤

-AST ❤
